bio: So Sally finds out, thanks to a shot of truth serum, that while she's been married to Harry for 17 years, he's actually been a spy for 18. Not only does he lead a secret life, but he's practically James Bond on steroids. What types of missions was he on, and how many times has he saved the country? He knows how to fly a Harrier, speaks a variety of languages, knows how to Tango, and is quite knowledgeable about nuclear warheads.
